column4: The splashcreen of my ubuntu 9.04 doesn't finish it's load anymore, instead it shows the kernel infos and then go to GDM. I'd already added "quiet" on ther kernel parameter of the boot entry. Please help, thanks
do you have nvidia drivers? Some computers seem to not have the nvidia logo appear anymore
So it jumps back out and then back in because (I'm guessing) it cannot find the nvidia display screen
